name: Intergalactic Pawn Shop: Prologue
description:
Dive into a Captivating RPG and Management Fusion Game!


Become an employee at an intergalactic pawn shop, where you'll wear many hats – from managing the store, engaging in one-on-one transactions, and conducting auctions, to performing essential repairs, ensuring customer satisfaction, and striving to meet sales targets.



However, don't just focus on your daily tasks; keep your senses alert to the world around you. Each item that crosses your path and every customer you encounter may hold hidden information that unveils the secrets of the world of Kora.



Experience an immersive world filled with choices that shape the destiny of Kora. Venture outside your shop to connect with new people and make crucial decisions. Your choices hold significant influence, not only shaping the future of Kora but also shaping your own destiny.

In your hands lies a powerful trading network, making you a magnet for those seeking your services. Will you use this influence wisely?

Prepare for an adventure to embark on a captivating journey that combines RPG excitement with running a shop in space, all set against the backdrop of a mysterious universe. The destiny of Kora awaits, and it's yours to shape!
